hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class SingleCloseable

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.SingleCloseable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancelable, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SingleCloseable
extends Object
implements Closeable, Cancelable
    Represents a closeable which allows only a single wrapped closeable instance. Once the wrapped closeable is set, any further attepmt will throw an IllegalStateException.

    This class might help in situations where decoupling closeables allows the referenced objects to be collected earlier by a GC.

    The implementation is thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.12.

      • set

        public void set(@Nonnull
       Closeable c)
        Sets the managed closeable if not already set. Throws an IllegalStateException if this instance already manages a closeable. If this instance is already closed, setting a new closeable will immediately close it
        Parameters:
        c - the closeable to handle
